flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: this project is good if you are just starting with Arduino.
guide.introduction_rendered: this project is good if you are just starting with Arduino.
guide.summary: This is a fun yet simple build. that will blink an LED in the same sequence as the Morse code for SOS.
guide.title: "SOS" light
